name: Perfect airplane flight simulation 3d Free
description:
***Select your plane and set out for ultimate real flight simulation adventurous journey***

Craze for flying planes..? Well Perfect Airplane flight game provides you opportunity to fly your selected plane in the most heart touching environments from ocean to beach from hilly mountains to islands. Master your pilot skills by safe landing and taking off plane from the airport. Different missions are provided you are supposed to complete missions with fuel and atmosphere constraints. This 3d game gives you chance to put yourself in the pilot seats of different planes much more then entertainment.
How to Play
- Control speed of plane by throttle given left side of your iphone device.
- Control direction of plane by joystick which is present bottom right of apple mobile.
- Double speed of plane by tapping of x2.
- Keep an eye on fuel to successfully complete mission.
- Radar will tell current position as well as destination place.
- Lower speed while landing.
- Pick up fuel power-ups to fill fuel tank.

Features
- top ios free offline flight simulation game.
- Excellent plane physics and controls implemented.
- Supports all Apple devices.
- 6 different thrilling missions.
- realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing landing effects.
- User friendly GUI and controls.
- real adventuring Environments looks like adventure movies.
- Support for hd iphone, ipad devices.
- game with Good quality sound effects.
- Best downloading airplane game.
